attributes.action: Rethink Road Tolls which would see drivers paying up to £60 per gallon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The proposed peak rate is £1.34 per mile.
If your vehicle averages 40 miles per gallon, for every 40 miles travelled at peak rate,tolls of £53.60 will be levied.
This is the equivalent of paying approx £60 per gallon of fuel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
